description: OpenAI PHP is a supercharged community-maintained PHP API client that allows you to interact with OpenAI API.

OpenAI PHP SDK : Most downloaded, forked, contributed, huge community supported, and used PHP (Laravel , Symfony, Yii, Cake PHP or any PHP framework) SDK for OpenAI GPT-3 and DALL-E. It also supports chatGPT-like streaming. (ChatGPT AI is supported)
Firefly III: a personal finances manager

SecLists is the security tester's companion. It's a collection of multiple types of lists used during security assessments, collected in one place. List types include usernames, passwords, URLs, sensitive data patterns, fuzzing payloads, web shells, and many more.

PHP版调用OpenAI最新接口和模型gpt-3.5-turbo进行问答的Demo，采用Stream流模式通信，一边生成一边输出，响应速度超过官网。前端采用JS的EventSource，支持Markdown格式解析，代码有着色处理。页面UI简洁，支持上下文连续会话。源码只有两三个文件，没用任何框架，支持所有PHP版本。只需要修改stream.php中的API_KEY即可使用，也可让浏览者使用自定义API_KEY。
